title: Alec Bohm of Phillies Connects for 1,000th World Series Homer
description: Jimmy Sebring hit the first World Series homer back in 1903 and in the third game of the 118th Fall Classic, Alec Bohm of the Phillies hit the 1,000th.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: Alec Bohm’s home run in the second inning of Tuesday’s game between the Philadelphia Phillies and the Houston Astros was the 1,000th in World Series history.
